类 putInitialArmyView

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component

              • gameviews.putInitialArmyView
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class putInitialArmyView
extends javax.swing.JDialog
    Class to define the GUI for players to place one by one their initial given armies on their own countries.

    Player place armies in round-robin fashion.

    另请参阅:
    JDialog, 序列化表格
